name: RPSX (Andrew Petersell)
description:
This ain’t your grandpa’s game of rochambeau, this is EXTREME!!!  RPSX is an 2-D fighting game currently in development that takes the classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors and pushes it to its limit.  During a match, players can shift between Rock Mode, Paper Mode, and Scissors mode.  Not only does each mode unlock new set of skills and abilities , but your attacks will do more damage if your state has an advantage over your opponent's.  Try to stay ahead of the game of Rock, Paper, Scissors while outmaneuvering and outplaying your opponent on the battlefield.

Made with Unity. Based on an original prototype I made using Phaser.

RPSX is currently in development.

Controls:
LS - Move
A - Jump
B - Projectile Attack
X - Normal Attacks
RT - Shield (LS while shielding to reposition shield)
LT - Confirm RPS Mode
RB/LB - Choose RPS Mode
